Version 0.2.2
2017-09-18
- python 3.x compatibility

Version 0.2.1
2016-12-16
- fixed setup.py failure due to missing README.md

Version 0.2.0
2016-12-15
- test suite added
- added object-like access to store methods
- added combine_reducers() sanity checking
- fixed compose()'s default identity function
- compose() optimization when len(args) is 1
- fixed store behavior after calling replace_reducer()
- fixed initial state not being passed to enhancers

Version 0.1.0
2016-05-03
- First release on PyPI
